summary: The diff shows implementation of image upload fixes and image editing functionality. Backend includes updateProductImage function and migration support. Frontend includes image upload in BatchUploader and SingleProductUploader with progress tracking, ProductCard edit dialog for image replacement, and useUpdateProductImage hook with cache invalidation. All core requirements appear to be addressed with proper error handling, progress tracking, and admin authorization.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module and migration logic in backend/main.mo
hallucinated_features.reason: Migration functionality was not requested in any requirement. The BuildRequest focused solely on fixing image upload and adding image editing capability, with no mention of data migration needs.
